benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Intelligence or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Keen Observer
effects: Choose one of the following skills: Insight, Investigation, or Perception. If you lack proficiency with the chosen skill, you gain proficiency in it, and if you already have proficiency in it, you gain Expertise in it.

benefits.name: Quick Search
effects: You can take the Search action as a Bonus Action.
